definition: home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]
right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple

sentences.english: In economic matters Europe and America were to some extent rivals.
sentences.chinese: 在经济方面，欧洲和美国在某种程度上是冤家对头。

sentences.english: J. Simpson trial, and cats versus dogs.
sentences.chinese: 辛普森审判，以及冤家对头猫与狗。
